replies.body: Bard ults, Blitzcrank uses Q, Kalista ults Blitzcrank and Blitzcrank shoots himself over a wall taking the victim with him, Blitzcrank uses E to knock up, Bard uses Q to stun, Bard gives kalista health, Blitzcrank uses Ult to Silence, Kalista uses a W for vision, Kalista presses E and pentakill. Bardlizta

> [{quoted}](name=sparklefart,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9zrdrxFp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-11T22:31:23.780+0000)
>
> Bard ults, Blitzcrank uses Q, Kalista ults Blitzcrank and Blitzcrank shoots himself over a wall taking the victim with him, Blitzcrank uses E to knock up, Bard uses Q to stun, Bard gives kalista health, Blitzcrank uses Ult to Silence, Kalista uses a W for vision, Kalista presses E and pentakill. Bardlizta

Or maybe for the longest pull ever, blitz grabs, kalista ults, walks through bards portal, and thresh is there with his lantern at the end of the portal?
If you complete that combo difficulty of 10/10, you destroy their nexus automatically
